text:
Xerardo Fernández Albor (7 September 1917 – 12 July 2018) was a Spanish physician. He serves as President of the autonomous community of Galicia from 1982 to 1987. He lost a motion of no confidence in 1987. He was a member of the People's Party.
Albor died in Santiago de Compostela on 12 July 2018, at the age of 100.
